org.springframework.aop.support

类 RootClassFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.aop.support.RootClassFilter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, ClassFilter

    public class RootClassFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassFilter, java.io.Serializable
    Simple ClassFilter implementation that passes classes (and optionally subclasses).
    作者:
    Rod Johnson
    另请参阅:

      • matches

        public boolean matches(java.lang.Class<?> candidate)
        从接口复制的说明: ClassFilter
        Should the pointcut apply to the given interface or target class?
        指定者:
        matches 在接口中 ClassFilter
        参数:
        candidate - the candidate target class
        返回:
        whether the advice should apply to the given target class
